articles.description: Singapore and other South-east Asian countries lag behind the rest of the world when it comes to immunising a person through the course of his life.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Vaccination at every stage of life after childhood remains one of the most cost-effective measures to protect against infectious diseases, a study has found.
